name: Antibiotic stewardship: volume of antibiotic prescribing (KTT9)
title: Antibiotic stewardship: volume of antibiotic prescribing (KTT9)
description: Number of prescription items for all antibacterial drugs (BNF 5.1)
per oral antibacterials (BNF 5.1 sub-set) item-based STAR-PU.
why_it_matters: Antimicrobial resistance poses a significant threat to public health,
especially because antimicrobials underpin routine medical practice.
It is important that we don't overuse antibiotics. This measure shows how many are being prescribed locally.
